description: The remarkably small and lightweight iHP-120 plays over 600 hours of digital music. Within the sleek magnesium body lies a rechargeable battery that delivers up to 16 hours of life, a built-in FM tuner, an ultra-fast USB 2.0 connection and an intuitive interface that makes it easy to find any song.Features20 GB of internal storageHolds over 600 hours of digital music*Built in rechargeable lithium-ion batteryUp to 16 hours of battery lifeSupports MP3, WMA, ASF, OGG and WAV music filesUltra-fast USB 2.0 transfers (up to 40 times faster than USB 1.0)Integrated FM tunerIntuitive music navigationReal-time MP3 encoding (no PC required)Store or transfer files of any typeExtra-large, 8-line, backlit LCDLine-in and Line-out jacksOptical input and outputUpgradeable to future formats and featuresDimensions: Approximately 60 millimeters (W) by 19 millimeters (D) by 105 millimeters (H)Weight: Approx. 160 grams*Over 600 hours of music based on Windows Media format at 64 kbps.What's in the boxiHP-120 Digital Music Player, iRiver earphones , backlit remote control with 4-line display, carrying case (with belt loop), installation software CD, AC adapter, USB 2.0 cable, line-in cable, and printed user manual.
title: iriver H120 20GB MP3 Jukebox
